goals__remit:
VERTECH GROUP is a French SME engineering with business focus on high-tech environmental 
engineering and innovation business development. Vertech Group aims to create value by 
supporting and advising private and public organizations in different sectors (recycling, waste, 
energy, water, etc.), and regions (e.g. Europe, Latin America) to get from research to market. 
 
The company is based in Nice, in the French EcoValley, an example of a real sustainable urban 
environment. Vertech is also present in Spain and has expansion plans to other markets besides 
Europe (i.e. South America). 
Vertech is member of several national and international platforms: 
 French Life Cycle Assessment Platform (Avnir). 
 European Sustainable Process Industry through Resource and Energy Efficiency Public 
Private Partnership (SPIRE PPP). 
 Full member of the Bio-based industries consortium (BIC) 
 
VERTECH SPECIFIC ACTIVITIES IN INTERNATIONAL R&D PROJECTS 
1. Environmental, social and economic feasibility studies and risk assessments 
 Life Cycle Assessment (LCA)  Environmental impacts determination through 
the whole life cycle for environmental validation, including: Climate change – 
GHG emissions, Human toxicity, eco-toxicity, acidification, etc. 
 Life Cost Cycle (LCC)  CAPEX and OPEX definition for economic validation and 
techno-economic assessments. 
 Social Life Cycle Assessment (S-LCA)  socio-economic impacts determination, 
including: Human rights, Working conditions, Society Health and safety, 
Governance, Socio-economic repercussions etc. 
 Risk assessments (technical, economic, environmental and social): risks 
identification, risks quantification, contingency and mitigation plan of main 
risks. 
2. Exploitation of results: innovative products ranking, general and specific market 
analysis, business case, business strategy and business plans.
